attributes.action: ensure that a sign showing the speed limit appears no more than 100 yards before any speed camera
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would rather we dispensed with so-called Safety Cameras altogether (see other petitions!) but if they are genuinely there in the interest of safety then their aim should be to ensure that we are driving within the speed limit at that point, not fine us for exceeding it. Therefore it is essential that we know what the limit is that we should not be exceeding
